com.cmput301.cs.project.adapters

Class TextWatcherAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cmput301.cs.project.adapters.TextWatcherAdapter

  • public abstract class TextWatcherAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
    Stub class that contains empty implementations of TextWatcher. All methods are safe to override without calling super. 

     final TextView textView = …;
 textView.addTextChangedListener(new TextWatcherAdapter() {
    @Override
     public void afterTextChanged(Editable s) {
         final String string = s.toString();
         …
     }
 });
    instead of 
     final TextView textView = …;
 textView.addTextChangedListener(new TextWatcher() {
    @Override
     public void beforeTextChanged(CharSequence s, int start, int count, int after) {
         // do nothing
     }

    @Override
     public void onTextChanged(CharSequence s, int start, int before, int count) {
         // do nothing
     }

    @Override
     public void afterTextChanged(Editable s) {
         final String string = s.toString();
         …
     }
 });
